name: Ollie's Farm (Demo Available)
description:
"Ollie's Farm is a PS1 horror game inspired by Silent Hill and Edutainment games of the 1990's. SUMMARY

Help Farmer Ollie find his missing corn in a bright and vibrant world. But underneath lies a waking nightmare of groaning steel and flesh. Now you must escape Farmer Ollie and put an end to this nightmare.

FEATURES

-True to life graphics

- Educational Value

-A fun time with friends 

-Flesh and Metal

-Suffering

-Tortured Soul

Ollie's Farm PS1 case created by: Akuma Kira
